dcterms:creator: Iván Cantador
Peter Brusilovsky
Tsvi Kuflik
dcterms:description: A dataset containing information about movies and television programs, including cast, production crew, and plot summaries. A subset of IMDb is used, containing 4278 movies, 2081 directors, and 5257 actors, with movies labeled as one of three classes based on their genre information.
dcterms:title: IMDb

dcterms:creator: Jing Gao
Feng Liang
Wei Fan
Yizhou Sun
Jiawei Han
dcterms:description: A dataset extracted from the DBLP computer science bibliography website, containing 4057 authors, 14328 papers, 7723 terms, and 20 publication venues. Authors are divided into four research areas, and each author is described by a bag-of-words representation of their paper keywords.
dcterms:title: DBLP

dcterms:creator: Iván Cantador
Peter Brusilovsky
Tsvi Kuflik
dcterms:description: A dataset from the Last.fm music website that tracks users' listening information. The dataset consists of 1892 users, 17632 artists, and 1088 artist tags, used for link prediction tasks.
dcterms:title: Last.fm
